channel.title: DELTASCAPE Source Problems/Questions
channel.description:
I'm using the deltascape source releases by _Delta
Its perfect apart from a few little things
1. Pking, I can't make it so admins lose their items when they die, also I cant make admins do pickups even though player rights is 2 and owners can do it?
2. NPC Xp - one hit to an npc gives 12000000 xp and takes them to level 51
3. Prayer points are messed up, when I put prayer on, the points either stay still, go down one or two and go up, or just go up?
Please helm me with this, I will appreciate it[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 30, 2008, 03:27:09 pm[/size][hr]Fixed Number 3.
And changed number 1

item.title: DELTASCAPE Source Problems/Questions
item.dc:creator: @eXtrosion eXtrosion
item.description:
@eXtrosion wrote:

I’m using the deltascape source releases by _Delta

Its perfect apart from a few little things

  1. Pking, I can’t make it so admins lose their items when they die, also I cant make admins do pickups even though player rights is 2 and owners can do it?

  2. NPC Xp - one hit to an npc gives 12000000 xp and takes them to level 51

  3. Prayer points are messed up, when I put prayer on, the points either stay still, go down one or two and go up, or just go up?

Please helm me with this, I will appreciate it[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 30, 2008, 03:27:09 pm[/size][hr]Fixed Number 3.

And changed number 1

Read full topic
